site.title: Stevn
site.tagline: Mobile Healthcare Expert & Community Builder | Passionate about creating innovative digital health solutions and fostering tech communities.
site.description: Personal blog and portfolio of Stevn - Product Manager specializing in digital healthcare, new media operations, and data analytics

welcome.title: OH, HI. WELCOME!
welcome.subtitle: I'm Stevn, nice to meet you!
welcome.navigationGuide: Use the menu bar above to quickly navigate to different sections of the website. You'll find my blog posts, social media links, and useful resources.
welcome.intro1: I'm deeply passionate about the mobile healthcare industry, with expertise in creating comprehensive digital health solutions. I've led products from concept to market, covering the entire patient journey - from online consultations and prescriptions to payment processing and hospital management systems. My work has helped scale platforms from 1 million to 8 million users.
welcome.intro2: Beyond healthcare, I'm an active community organizer in Shanghai's tech scene. I dedicate my spare time to building platforms for entrepreneurs, product managers, developers, and designers. I've been involved in organizing events like Women Techmarkers, Devfest Shanghai, and various tech meetups, fostering connections and knowledge sharing in our vibrant tech community.
welcome.currentDesc: Leading new media operations and digital healthcare initiatives
welcome.previousDesc: 9+ years in digital healthcare and product strategy
welcome.communityDesc: Active organizer in Shanghai's tech community and passionate about various interests
welcome.techCommunityDesc: Organizer of Women Techmarkers, Devfest Shanghai, and various tech meetups
welcome.personalInterestsDesc: Food enthusiast, home cooking, sharing culinary experiences with friends

social.title: Social Media & Contact
social.subtitle: Connect with me on various platforms and stay updated with my latest content.

resources.title: Resources
resources.subtitle: Useful tools, links, and recommendations that I find valuable in my work and learning journey.

development.title: Development Tools
development.vscode: My go-to code editor with excellent extensions and customization options.
development.github: Essential platform for version control, collaboration, and project hosting.
development.docker: Containerization platform that simplifies development and deployment workflows.

learning.title: Learning Resources
learning.mdn: Comprehensive documentation for web technologies and standards.
learning.stackoverflow: The go-to community for programming questions and solutions.
learning.freecodecamp: Free coding bootcamp with hands-on projects and certifications.

design.title: Design & UI
design.figma: Collaborative design tool for creating user interfaces and prototypes.
design.unsplash: High-quality free photos for web projects and design work.
design.googlefonts: Free web fonts that are easy to use and integrate into projects.

productivity.title: Productivity
productivity.notion: All-in-one workspace for notes, tasks, and project management.
productivity.todoist: Task management app that helps organize projects and deadlines.
productivity.rescuetime: Time tracking tool that provides insights into digital habits and productivity.

books.title: Recommended Books
books.cleancode: Essential principles for writing maintainable and readable code.
books.pragmatic: Timeless tips for becoming a better programmer and problem solver.
books.ydkjs: Deep dive into JavaScript fundamentals and advanced concepts.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: This website is designed with privacy in mind. We collect minimal data and do not use tracking cookies or analytics that compromise your privacy. Any data collection is limited to:
dataCollection.item1: Basic server logs for security and performance monitoring
dataCollection.item2: Language preference stored locally in your browser
dataCollection.item3: No personal information is collected without explicit consent

cookies.title: Cookies and Local Storage
cookies.content: This website uses minimal local storage to enhance your experience:
cookies.item1: Language preference to remember your chosen language
cookies.item2: No tracking cookies or third-party analytics
cookies.item3: You can clear this data anytime through your browser settings

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: External links on this website may lead to third-party services with their own privacy policies. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of external websites.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact me through the social media links provided on this website.

usage.title: Website Usage
usage.content: This website is provided for informational and educational purposes. By accessing this website, you agree to use it responsibly and in accordance with applicable laws.

content.title: Content and Intellectual Property
content.content: All content on this website, including blog posts, code examples, and design elements, is the intellectual property of the website owner unless otherwise stated. You may:
content.item1: Read and share links to the content
content.item2: Use code examples for learning and personal projects
content.item3: Quote brief excerpts with proper attribution

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The information on this website is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. While I strive for accuracy, I cannot guarantee that all information is current, complete, or error-free.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: The website owner shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use of this website or its content, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: These terms may be updated from time to time. Continued use of the website constitutes acceptance of any changes.

footer.poweredBy: Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
